response.raw:
Here is my response formatted as requested:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Enforcing Administration Policies and Rules for Students

1. Familiarize yourself with policies
   - Carefully review school handbook and code of conduct
   - Attend staff meetings on policy updates
   - Ask administrators to clarify any unclear rules

2. Communicate expectations clearly
   - Review key policies with students at start of year
   - Post classroom rules visibly 
   - Remind students of policies as needed

3. Be consistent in enforcement
   - Apply rules fairly to all students
   - Follow through on stated consequences
   - Document policy violations

4. Use positive reinforcement
   - Recognize students following rules
   - Implement reward systems for good behavior
   - Model expected conduct yourself

5. Address violations promptly
   - Intervene quickly for minor infractions
   - Report serious violations to administration
   - Contact parents when appropriate

6. Promote student accountability
   - Have students acknowledge rules in writing
   - Encourage peer-to-peer reminders
   - Allow students to suggest fair consequences

7. Seek support when needed
   - Consult colleagues on challenging situations
   - Involve counselors or administrators for repeat offenders
   - Request additional training if struggling with enforcement

</OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Enforcing Administration Policies and Rules for Students

1. Familiarize yourself with policies
   - Carefully review school handbook and code of conduct
   - Attend staff meetings on policy updates
   - Ask administrators to clarify any unclear rules

2. Communicate expectations clearly
   - Review key policies with students at start of year
   - Post classroom rules visibly 
   - Remind students of policies as needed

3. Be consistent in enforcement
   - Apply rules fairly to all students
   - Follow through on stated consequences
   - Document policy violations

4. Use positive reinforcement
   - Recognize students following rules
   - Implement reward systems for good behavior
   - Model expected conduct yourself

5. Address violations promptly

   - Report serious violations to administration

6. Promote student accountability
